alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 9:15PM EDT until April 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Accomack County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 915 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Onancock, or 15 miles north of Exmore, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Onancock and Onley around 920 PM EDT. Parksley around 925 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harborton, Melfa, Mappsville, Wachapreague, Accomac, Wallops Island, Nelsonia, Locustville, Modest Town and Pungoteague. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
